title: Christopher Fowler-The Memory of Blood
description:
Christopher FowlerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s acclaimed Peculiar Crimes Unit novels crackle with sly wit, lively suspense, and twists as chilling as LondonÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s fog. Now the indomitable duo of Arthur Bryant and John May, along with the rest of their quirky team, return to solve a confounding case with dark ties to the British theater and a killer who may mean curtains for all involved.

For the crew of the New Strand Theatre, the play The Two Murderers seems less performance than prophecy when a cast party ends in the shocking death of the theater ownerÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s son. The crime scene is most unusual, even for Bryant and May. In a locked bedroom without any trace of fingerprints or blood, the only sign of disturbance is a gruesome life-size puppet of Mr. Punch laying on the floor.
